reviewText: Bought this for my father for Father's Day, and he and I were very impressed. Great video with great visuals of the rifles and a little history on the men who owned them (Hemmingway, Elmer Keith, ect..). I would recommend this to anyone who is into big bore, African hunting, or a (historic) firearms enthusiast in general.

This book went into great detail on many of the hunters and guns they used. I have read many articles over the years about these great hunters but to actually see a video on these guns and to actually see them used again is priceless.
